short_summary: Request for Proposal: E60HL-24K201-A RFP Bulk Coloured Diesel Fuel
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME:... (description omitted for brevity)
full_summary:
#Global Tender for Bulk Coloured Diesel Fuel

##Title Information

* Title (English): E60HL-24K201-A RFP Bulk Coloured Diesel Fuel
* Title (French): E60HL-24K201-A DDP Carburant diesel coloré en vrac

##Tender Reference Information

* Reference Number: WS4523091165-DOC4523650373
* Solicitation Number: WS4523091165

##Tender Details

* Tender Closing Date: May 8, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT
* Amendment Number: 1
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 30, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: May 29, 2025

##Supply Requirements

* A total potential quantity of 710,000 litres (Item 1) and 95,000 litres (Item 2) of coloured diesel fuel

##Delivery Details

* To be delivered by tank wagon to the port of Quebec City, Quebec
* Loaded onto a Canadian Coast Guard vessel (CCGS DesGroseilliers) for furtherance to Eureka, NU
* Tentatively scheduled for June 14 and 15, 2024

##Applicable Trade Agreements

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

##Procurement Information

* Type: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Classification: Goods - Diesel fuel off road (UNSPSC 15101513)
* Delivery Regions: Indigenous Lands, Quebec (except NCR), Nunavut Territory

##Contracting Entity Information

* Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

##Contact Information

* Erin O'Neill (SPAC/PSP
